p: Attention to how radical forms of difference play out in the hotspot points to some of the connections neglected by conventional analysisâ€”consider, for instance, that the outbreak ward is formed both through the construction of hyper-protective barriers and obligations to provide loving care; that abandoned plantations are remnants of declining colonial economies and sites of new hunting practices and markets for bushmeat. It is often at occasions when such differences become materially proximate that transmission occurs.
